name: Syncfinity Helper
author: syncfinity

sections.description: Syncfinity Helper allows authentication with the WordPress API, using the API credentials for an installed WooCommerce API, utilising the WooCommerce consumer key and consumer secret in a basic auth request, in order to interact with the WordPress API, for purposes such as uploading media via the media endpoint.
sections.installation:
1. Extract syncfinity-helper.zip
  2. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Syncfinity Helper allows users to authenticate with the WordPress API using WooCommerce API credentials.
description: Syncfinity Helper allows authentication with the WordPress API, using the API credentials for an installed WooCommerce API, utilising the WooCommerce consumer key and consumer secret in a basic auth request, in order to interact with the WordPress API, for purposes such as uploading media via the media endpoint.
